actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

actions.subcommittee: Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Domestic Marketing, Consumer Relations, and Nutrition

official_title: A bill to amend the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to solicit applications for unprocessed agricultural commodities available for distribution under such Act.
short_title: Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Solicitation Amendment of 1988

summary.text: Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Solicitation Amendment of 1988 - Amends the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to solicit at least annually applications for unprocessed agricultural commodities available for distribution under such Act.

titles.title: Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Solicitation Amendment of 1988

A bill to amend the Temporary Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to solicit applications for unprocessed agricultural commodities available for distribution under such Act.
